{"id":968490784,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"2 weeks, 3 days","timestamp":1686451355,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"43 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/968490784/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Lexicographically Smallest String After Substring Operation","memory":"49.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public String smallestString(String s) {\n        char[] arr=s.toCharArray();\n        int start=0;\n        while(start<s.length() && arr[start]=='a'){\n            start++;\n        }\n        if(start==s.length()){\n           arr[arr.length-1]='z';\n        }\n        \n        for(int i=start;i<s.length();i++){\n            if(arr[i]=='a'){\n                break;\n            }\n            arr[i]=(char)(arr[i]-1);\n            \n        }\n        StringBuilder sb=new StringBuilder();\n        for(int i=0;i<arr.length;i++){\n            sb.append(arr[i]);\n        }\n        return sb.toString();\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"lexicographically-smallest-string-after-substring-operation","has_notes":false}
